price: Rabbiin [mindaa qishnaa isaaniitiif] isaanitti qishnaa godha; jallina isaanii keessatti isaan dhiisa odoo isaan dhama’anuu .
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَهۡزِئُ بِهِمۡ وَيَمُدُّهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yastahzi-u bihim wayamudduhum fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
